data.title: White Men Don’t Love White Women

data.text:
European colonialism was essentially a rape tour.

White men colonized Africa, Asia, Australia, and The Americas, invading villages, ripping families apart, molesting children, and raping both women and men. They were having the time of their lives, even creating postcards depicting their sexual exploits worldwide.

At one point, things became so out of hand that France had to empty it’s prisons, and send hundreds of female criminals to Louisiana. They hoped that the arrival of white women would stop the colonizers from impregnating native and enslaved African women. French officials feared that white men would become outnumbered by Indians, enslaved Africans, and their mixed-race offspring, resulting in a rebellion (this fear eventually became true in Saint Domingue, modern day Haiti).

As European control strengthened, some of the rape that occurred in colonized places turned into coercion. Societies were created on these foreign lands where all power was held by white men. If an indigenous or enslaved woman wanted any shot at a better life, her best bet was to become a white man’s mistress. In America, that type of society still exists today, with white and Asian men at the top of the racial wealth chart, and Black men at the very bottom.

The lynching of Black men throughout the 20th Century was defended as white men protecting the virtue of white women, with most lynchings transpiring after a report of a Black man sexually assaulting a white woman. A strange phenomenon has developed today in regards to pornography. Interracial cuckold porn, in which a white woman has sex with a Black man while her white husband watches and masturbates, is one of the most promoted porn categories, appearing on the front pages of popular porn websites with descriptions like “BBC” and “Blacked”. Categories like “Ghetto Gaggers”, though less promoted but just as popular, are widely produced as well. This greatly challenges the myth of protecting the white woman’s virtue, a myth many of our Black ancestors were killed for. White men tortured Black men, cut off their penis, hung and set them on fire, all in the name of protecting white women’s honor, only for the grandsons of these same white men to film porn that depicts Black men having sex with white women, while a white man watches. The irony…

In Colonial Australia, the rape of indigenous women and kidnapping of their children was used as a tool of extermination. White settlers developed plans for “breeding out” the Aborigines, with people like Dr. Cecil Cook (Chief Protector of Aborigines and noted White Supremacist) stating as follows:

“…generally by the fifth and invariably by the sixth generation, all native characteristics of the Australian Aborigine are eradicated. The problem of our half-castes will quickly be eliminated by the complete disappearance of the black race, and the swift submergence of their progeny in the white.”

A.O. Neville (also Chief “Protector” of Aborigines) said:

“Eliminate the full-blood and permit the white admixture to half-castes and eventually the race will become white”.

These comments were made in an era when white women in America were fighting white men for the right to vote with the Suffrage movement. White men couldn’t grant them this basic right because they were too busy trying to fuck Black people out of existence. In that same era, New Orleans was conducting an experiment in which prostitution was tolerated, as long as practiced within a thirty-eight block area known as “Storyville”. Many of the prostitutes in Storyville were white women, secretly portraying themselves as ‘octoroons’ (women with one-eighth of Black ancestry). Sex with an octoroon was a fetish held by white men who ventured into the area, finding it erotic. To reiterate, in this era, white men were killing Black men in defense of white women, denying white women the right to vote, all while seeking sex with non-white women.
